Text: The First Year on PBSDear Friend I hope that this letter finds you in good spirits and health and that youve returned from your summer refreshed One of the highlights of my summer is watching The First Year a new documentary by Davis Guggenheim I was profoundly touched by this film and want to encourage you to watch it as it will be broadcast by PBS throughout the country over the next few days The First Year follows five young people through their rookie year of teaching in the Los Angeles public school system The film draws the viewer in by weaving together personal and incredibly human stories of novice teachers trying to connect with and nurture their students The First Year is a truly moving portrait of our nations schools I guarantee that it will inspire both hope and outrage The show airs this Wednesday September at pm on WGBX in the Boston area and premieres on PBS in most other cities on September at pm The attached file has the air dates for most major markets for example In New York on September at pm In Boston on September at pm In San Francisco and Los Angeles on Sept at pm firstyear I sincerely hope that you will watch The First Year I guarantee that it wont be a waste of your valuable time Many thanks and best regards Sincerely Li Lu PBSairdatestimesdoc
